mdRecord.dcterms:description: part of Florham estate farm, built for Hamilton McKown Twombly and his wife, Florence Adele Vanderbilt, a member of the Vanderbilt family. Now part of the Florham Campus of Fairleigh Dickinson University, the mansion is one of the ten largest houses in the United States. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florham [work]
